434.32.text: or even putting any technology into it.

439.40.text: it's a real tenet of the d.School.

443.95.text: 'Cause you want rough-and-rapid to get the idea out there

452.33.text: Get it out there to learn from it

1130.13.text: I think it's your analogy around if you put four people

1141.04.text: So, if you are practiced at brainstorming,

1463.26.text: and the president of Sonos, the founder of Sonos.

3211.32.text: you may not be world-class but you could get pretty good.
